meanings.definition: The quality of being late or delayed.
meanings.sent1: Her constant untimelinesses caused her to miss the bus every morning.
meanings.sent2: The untimelinesses of the train made everyone late for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The untimelinesses of the alarm clock always seemed to have a sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: The untimelinesses of the delivery was like a slow-motion movie scene.
meanings.sent5: The untimelinesses of the package arrival was as frustrating as waiting for a snail to cross the finish line.

meanings.definition: The state of not occurring at an appropriate or suitable time.
meanings.sent1: The untimelinesses of the thunderstorm ruined the outdoor picnic.
meanings.sent2: His untimelinesses in responding to emails often caused misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The untimelinesses of the traffic light turning green made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The untimelinesses of the flowers blooming in winter was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The untimelinesses of the surprise party made it even more memorable for the birthday girl.
